violations.title: Food and nonfood contact surfaces properly designed, cleaned, and constructed
violations.narrative: Debris build-up on floor in dry storage area behind shelving. (4-602.13) Nonfood-contact surfaces shall be cleaned at a frequency necessary to preclude accumulation of soil residues.

violations.title: Plumbing installed, backflow prevention, hot/cold running water, available, adequate, under pressure
violations.narrative: Back-flow prevention device on mop sink leaking. (5-205.15) Plumbing system shall be repaired according to law and maintained in good repair.
